about_the_game: Destination: Mars is a VR-based multi-person online exploration travel experience. The destination of the trip is Mars in the solar system, and you can create and play a virtual character image. The various geomorphic areas on Mars provide the experiencer with different choices of travel routes, and in different routes every day, you will get different mission instructions. You will follow these instructions and enjoy the spectacular scenery in different areas of Mars. On the way, you will also experience the special gameplay we have prepared for you. You can now choose to climb the unknown mountain in Mariner Canyon alone, produce your own bottle of drinking water from Mars in Utopia Plain, or you can travel with the travelers you just met, visit the traces left by human beings on Mars, and see the scenery of Mars at a glance.
